Puppet Hydras::

Puppet Hydras go inside and waited that Vykos let him sat 
down "Well... Milord, "said Hydras while he adopted a more polite 
tone"what do you wish speak with me?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Vykos: That's LORD Vykos for you. You would do well to remember 
> that...
> 
> He seemed annoyed at the unformalities of Hydras, but said nothing 
> more.
> 
> Vykos: Your slaves can stay here for now. Come inside, let's chat.
> 
> He led Hydras to a small but cozy room, where Lord Vykos sat on a 
> throne of decepticon-purple velvet and metal.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras Puppet::
> > 
> > "Yes... I heard a lot things a lot about you Vykos... A lot 
things 
> > that could do a predacon proud... And at this time, I should 
guess

Puppet

> you,

confortable... "
